content.rendered:
Directed by Vikram Bhatt

Written by Vikram Bhatt. Srivinay Salian. Vikram Bhatt

Cast Sanaya Irani(Simran Singh). Shivam Bhaargava(Karan Khanna). Vikram Bhatt(Doctor Singh). Gayathri Iyer(Barkha). Ananya Raj(Sonia (as Ananya Sengupta)). Manusmit Rana(Nitin Rawal). Vishal Dave(Asylum Adminstrator). Monisha Hassen(Yasmine). Rabia Maddah(Mel). Ameet Chana(Bob Anand). Caroline Wilde(Rachel). Hazel Croney(Neena). Diljohn Singh(Sid (as Diliohn)). Clive Dancey(Party Leader 1). Tino Orsini(Party Leader 2). Aidan Barry(Party Leader 3). Gary Heron(Judge Francis D’Zouza). Daniel Osgood(Mr. Douglas (Public Prosecutor)). Alex Lipitch(News Reporter 1). Raha Rahbari(Reporter 4 (as Raha A. Rahbari)) . Manoj Anand(Karan’s Election Campaigner / Asylum Male Nurse). Raj Awasti(Possessed Court Attendee). Des Barron(Old Man). Shean Caisley(Delivery person). Jonathon Daley(Possessed Jury Member). Imre Elekes(Karan’s Election Campaigner). Michael Entwistle(Cadaver). Laurence Ford(Richard). Amy Good(Nurse in Prison). Metin Hassan(Solicitor). Annie Hawkins(Asylum Doctor). Ken Hough(Court Jury / Court Officer). Sharif Islam(Karan’s Election Campaigner). Dolly Jagdeo(Solicitor). Peter Jay(Alfred The Court Officer). Mariia Legun(Karan’s Election Campaigner). James Littlewood(David (as James De’Val)). Soni Marwah(Asylum Patient). Bharat Mistri(Court Jury). Monica Narang(Asylum Female Nurse). Alex Ochman(Prison Attendent George Linton). Stela Papastefanou(Asylum Nurse). Louisa Sexton(Simran’s Secretary). Atul Sharma(Court Jury / Karan’s Election Campaigner). Gaurav Sharma(Possessed Court Attendee). Vinita Sharma(Court Jury). Joanna Shegera(Court Attendee). Mick Solak(Warden). Lee Comley(News Reporter (uncredited)). Nick Field(Funder (uncredited)). Tony Holness(Security Gaurd (uncredited)). Shaizeen Persha(News Reporter (uncredited)). Jim Quirke(Removal Man (uncredited)). Karl-Martin Rantapelkonen(Paparazzi (uncredited)). Benjamin Ruhle(Juror (uncredited)). Mirsad Solakovic(Police Officer (uncredited)). Chris Wilson(Police Officer (uncredited)). Jason Yip(Asylum Doctor (uncredited))

Languages Hindi. English

Producers Mehboob Ansari. Jason Ash. Vashu Bhagnani. Surabhi Bhatnagar. Mohit Chhabra. Vikrant Chopra

Production Eyka Film. Pooja Entertainment & Film. Bombay Walla Film
